It‚Äôs easy to re-analyze *most* meta-analyses because the data you need is typically reported in forest plots. 

In my new blogpost, I demonstrate how to use this data to calculate the power of each individual effect, using just a few lines of #Rstats code https://t.co/uzaL9JqMnn

I have done a little exploration on comparing running linear models in #rstats, compared to t-tests, ANOVA's and ANCOVA's. 
I got some new experiences here, and hope other's find it interesting!
